contents.text: Thank you for calling SavvyMoney in the East Bay, the only solution providing comprehensive credit score analysis, full credit reports, monitoring, and personalized offers all in one dashboard.
For existing members and account services, please press 1 now.
If you have questions about your credit score or full credit report, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a credit report specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to dispute an error on my credit report.
I want to review my full credit report and check for any errors before applying for a VA home loan.
Review my full credit report breakdown, including tradelines and utilization metrics, and dispute any errors.
I need help understanding the recent change in my credit report and score.
I’d like to clarify an unexpected entry on my credit report.

contents.text: If you need assistance with credit monitoring or alerts, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a credit monitoring specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to set up real-time credit monitoring alerts.
I need to set up credit monitoring alerts to watch for identity theft after relocating post-service.
Configure custom credit monitoring thresholds and enable real-time alerts for inquiries and score fluctuations.
I want to set up credit monitoring alerts to watch for identity theft.
I want to enable real-time monitoring alerts for any changes to my credit profile.

contents.text: For new customer inquiries and sales information, please press 2 now.
If you'd like to hear about personalized financial offers, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our offers team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to explore personalized financial offers available to me.
I’m interested in personalized loan or credit card offers designed specifically for veterans.
Explore data-driven personalized loan and credit card offers based on my risk profile and optimization recommendations.
I'm looking for personalized loan or credit card offers that fit my needs.
I’m interested in reviewing customized financial offers that fit my student budget.

contents.text: If you're interested in our financial technology partnerships, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships department.

navigationGoals: I need information on partnering my business with your fintech solutions.
I’d like information on fintech partnerships that provide special financial tools for ex-military personnel.
Obtain technical partnership details on integrating SavvyMoney’s credit APIs into my fintech platform, including specs and pricing.
I’d like to know if you partner with my local credit union for these services.
I’m exploring a potential fintech partnership opportunity for a student research project.
